summary: An actor holds a burglar hostage on New Year's Eve, after his girlfriend leaves him and his cat dies.
cast: Lombardo Boyar|Steve Guttenberg|Cynthia Watros|A.J. Benza|Tom Wright|Shirley Knight|Kenneth Moskow|Paul Dillon|Fred Medrano|Ann Guttenberg|Stanley Guttenberg|Kim Marriner|Patsy Fitzgerald|Christopher Vogler|Lisa Popeil|Susan Stahnke|Frederick Lawrence|Tom Mesmer|Meghan Rafferty|Dan Rosenberg
title: Por cierto, tu gato ha muerto
